title: Marc: PC版的领域地图上传限制提高了
author: Wolverine
txt_content:

@Marc
The PC Realms world upload limit has been bumped up significantly. Go nuts uploading those big city builds!
PC版领域的地图上传限制已被显著提高。现在你们可以疯狂的上传地图了！
